programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Vernosť až za hrob: Päťdesiatnik Martin a o dvadsať rokov mladšia Jana sú manželmi vyše dvoch rokov. On je majiteľom úspešnej firmy, kde sa spoznal s novou láskou. Jeho jediná dcéra Denisa si s macochou príliš nerozumie, pretože si myslí, že sa snaží otca iba využiť. Preto ju o to viac prekvapí rozhodnutie, ktoré sa otec chystá urobiť...

programme.title: Uragán
programme.desc: Legendárna markizácka televízna šou, z ktorej vzišli mnohé nezabudnuteľné postavičky ako sexy fúzačka pani Mária, malý samozvaný intelektuál zo základnej školy Mirko, nadčasová (nielen) hiphopová skupina Krímeš či azda najznámejší internacionálny, nedobrovoľne vtipný tandem, ktorý tvoria Slovák ako repa František Stromokocúr a jeho štíhlejšie maďarské druhé ja László Komárom! Touto vtipnou, takmer hodinovou spŕškou skvelej zábavy s Petrom Marcinom a Andym Krausom divákov vtedy i dnes sprevádzala krehká blondínka s neprepočuteľným hlasom Zuzana Šikulová.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Pes: László sa vráti domov so psom, ktorý nemá obojok a sleduje ho na každom kroku od vynesenia smetí. Presvedčí Ildikó, že psík by mohol byť reinkarnovaný Bundášik. Psík je evidentne v adolescentnom veku a všetko sa snaží rozhrýzť. Zuzana dostala tip na tovar z prevráteného poľského kamióna. Luxusné spodné prádlo svetovej značky, škoda že pravopis mena je trochu iný ako ako u originálu. František je z toho na nervy, ale Zuzana si nedá pokaziť radosť z očakávaného zisku. László sa ide poradiť k Františkovi o výchove psíka a overení jeho rasy. Ildikó sa stále snaží ovplyvniť čo najskoršie počatie vnuka "z vlastnej krvi". Andrejka ju opäť vymákne u Bobíka v ambulancii. A rieši to aj s Lászlóom, ktorého odvolá z Františkovho bytu, kde Bundášik ostáva sám s krabicami Zuzaninho tovaru... Milka chce Gergejovi k narodeninám pripraviť prekvapenie ako z filmu. Pozve všetkých k nim a schovaní sa chystajú vyskočiť na nič netušiaceho Gergeja, keď príde domov do zdanlivo opusteného bytu. Podarí sa Zuzane predať niečo z luxusného tovaru, alebo si vynúti náhradu škody od Lászlóa a Ildikó za kusy zničené Bundášikom? Ako dopadne Milkin nápad na prekvapenie oslávenca? A prečo do ich bytu zavíta aj exkluzívny hosť Paľo Habera?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Šeng fuj: Ildikó stále rieši počatie svojho vnuka. László je nešťastný, lebo v práci má kanceláriu pod schodami, ktorá je naviac kumbál na upratovačkine veci! František je nešťastný, lebo za ním László chodí vyplakávať kvôli kancelárii a pritom ho ťaží svedomie. On vyhodil Lászlóa z kancelárie a nechce ho naspäť. Ildikó privedie do Milkinho bytu kamarátku Majku, ktorá sa zaoberá umením "Šeng fuj", aby vytvorila harmonickú auru na plodenie dieťaťa. Františkova mamička sa Zuzane ponúkne, že jej predá zvyšok "značkového " spodného prádla z prevráteného kamióna. Podarí sa vylepšiť auru bytu mladomanželov prvkami feng šuj tak, aby to Milka nezbadala? Ustojí František citové vydieranie Lászlóa, navyše usvedčený upratovačkou, pani Katkou z klamstva? Podarí sa mamičke predať Zuzanine šmejdy? Naozaj chodí niekedy odviezť pani Katku domov z práce Filip Tůma? A kto je inžinier Brhlík?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Plán: František má plán, ako sa dostať naspäť do vlastnej kancelárie aj s Lászlóom. Musia skompromitovať Ing. Brhlíka. Do plánu je zapojená aj nič netušiaca Marta. Ildikó dostáva na poslednú chvíľu správu o tanečnej súťaži Ifjú Szívek. František dáva Zuzane ultimátum: môže sa vrátiť domov až vtedy, keď sama predá zvyšné "fejkové" spodné prádlo. Podarí sa Marte na Lesnej správe nájsť správneho referenta, keď viacerí majú "vtáčie mená"? Koho všetkého Zuzana zapojí do svojho kšeftu a hlavne zbavenia sa "šmejdového tovaru"? Koho zoženie Ildikó za tanečného partnera a ako dopadnú v nemilosrdnej súťaži? Podarí sa vyštvať Ing. Brhlíka z Lesnej správy? A podarí sa Františkovi zaraziť Zuzaninu závislosť na predaji pochybného tovaru?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Návrat Bobíka: László privedie domov opäť Haberovho psa Bobíka. Ildikó si myslí, že jej ho kúpil, ale má ho iba 3 dni postrážiť. Problémom však je, že fakticky musí o stráženie poprosiť Františka, lebo Ildi ide do školy, on sám ide s Gergejom na vyšetrenie k urológovi a doma sú hluční majstri, ktorí vymieňajú kuchynský drez. František vyčíta Zuzane nákup predražených zubných pást, ktoré sú príčinou, že budú musieť zrušiť plánovanú dovolenku na jachte v Chorvátsku. Zuzana sa vyhovára, že za všetko môže pes, ktorý jej urobil prvú škodu už na "luxusnom spodnom prádle". László pochopí, že v tejto domácnosti mu Bobíka nepostrážia. Navyše Marta by rada využila Františkov byt na nácvik divadelnej postavy z Gogoľovho revízora. Na Lesnej správe je teda László v práci aj so psom. Tvrdí, že je na výcviku za poľovníckeho. Žiaľ pes, ktorý sa ľaká hvízdania sokola, by ťažko obstál v tomto obore. František, ktorý by potreboval výdatne zrelaxovať, si nevie nájsť pokojné miesto. V jeho bývalej kancelárii bude ešte týždeň sedieť Ing. Brhlík, kým mu vyprší výpovedná lehota. Doma, ho prepadne Marta s celým divadelným ansámblom, a kým je László u urológa, tak nakoniec stráži aj psa, ktorý sa zľakne Martinho smiechu. František nenájde pokoj ani v byte u Lászlóa, lebo majstri ešte nedokončili výmenu drezu a u Milky nachytá párik, ktorý usilovne pracuje na jeho ďalšom vnúčati. Podarí sa Lászlóovi nájsť vyľakaného Bobíka, keď ho neplánovane musí vrátiť ešte v tej istý deň majiteľovi? Všimne si Zuzana doma rozbité okno aj obľúbenú vázu? Ako dopadne László, pri pokuse "jemne" zmanipulovať vrátenie psa? Nájde František konečne kľud aspoň v kutici pod schodami? A ako mu pomôže upratovačka, pani Katka?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Dovolenka: František so Zuzanou stále tvrdia, že idú na dovolenku na luxusnú jachtu, László s Ildilkó zas na veľtrh klobás do 5-hviezdičkového hotela v Debrecíne. Čo bude robiť vo Františkovom byte počas ich neprítomnosti Františkova mamička? Prečo v oboch bytoch pristihne Milku s Gergejom v chúlostivých situáciách? Spoločnú bytovku Susedov navštívia nefalšovaní šmejdi, v Marte a mamičke však nájdu dôstojných protivníkov. Podarí sa Martin plán, aby sa najlepší kamaráti, ktorí tentoraz nešli na dovolenku spoločne, stretli na polceste medzi Debrecínom a chorvátskym pobrežím? A prečo Ildikó aj Zuzana podozrievajú svojich manželov z nevery? A čoho bude dôkazom fotka z policajného radaru v Bešeňovej?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Kto hľadá, nájde. Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: V Hornej Dolnej začnú miznúť ľudia. Prvá sa stratí Erika. Je potrebná záchranná akcia.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Zachráňte Sojku! Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Sojka sa rozhodne odísť do mesta. Dedina musí spojiť sily, aby ho udržala doma.

programme.title: Smotánka
programme.sub-title: Nevšedný svet kľúčovou dierkou
programme.desc: Spoločenské akcie, honosné večierky a zábavné párty - miesta, kde sa bežný smrteľník len tak ľahko nedostane, ale s našou kamerou je možné nahliadnuť na miesta, kde to vrie zábavou, nádhernými róbami a známymi tvárami. Najaktuálnejšie dianie v spoločenskom živote, svet recepcií a večierkov, exkluzívne rozhovory s celebritami a tie najnovšie pikošky - vyberte sa so Smotánkou do prostredia „horných desaťtisíc"! Relácia, v ktorej vás svetom smotánky sprevádza šarmantná moderátorka Erika Judínyová.

programme.title: Uragán
programme.desc: Legendárna markizácka televízna šou, z ktorej vzišli mnohé nezabudnuteľné postavičky ako sexy fúzačka pani Mária, malý samozvaný intelektuál zo základnej školy Mirko, nadčasová (nielen) hiphopová skupina Krímeš či azda najznámejší internacionálny, nedobrovoľne vtipný tandem, ktorý tvoria Slovák ako repa František Stromokocúr a jeho štíhlejšie maďarské druhé ja László Komárom! Touto vtipnou, takmer hodinovou spŕškou skvelej zábavy s Petrom Marcinom a Andym Krausom divákov vtedy i dnes sprevádzala krehká blondínka s neprepočuteľným hlasom Zuzana Šikulová.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Návrat: Jakub sa vracia z výkonu trestu. Pred niekoľkými rokmi pod vplyvom alkoholu spôsobil nehodu, pri ktorej ťažko zranil človeka. Keďže matka mu dávno zomrela, rozhodne sa navštíviť otca, ktorý už dlhší čas žije s mladou milenkou...

programme.title: Varte s nami
programme.desc: Kulinárska relácia s receptami, tipmi a trikmi šéfkuchára Marcela Ihnačáka a cukrárky Veroniky Bušovej! Čakajú vás neoceniteľné tipy a tajné triky, ako rýchlo a jednoducho pripravíte hotový gurmánsky zážitok, ale i recepty dvoch majstrov varešky, ktorými Marcel a Veronika nepochybne sú...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Bude svadba?: Nastal ten veľký deň. Tesne pred odchodom na obrad sa zistí, že miestnosť ani svadobná hostina nie je zabezpečená. Pri organizácii prišlo k nedorozumeniu. László, ktorý to mal na starosti si omylom myslel, že to vybavuje František. V panike takmer zmeškajú odchod na svadbu. Milka s Gergejom musia hodnú chvíľu trúbiť v aute pod oknami a ani tak si ich nikto nevšíma. Na úrade sa zistí, že Ildikó zabudla obrúčky pre novomanželov. Ešteže Marta prišla na motorke a tak sa László a František stihnú pre ne vrátiť. Ale vrátia sa v zdraví aj späť? Navyše mešká Františkov otec, ktorý si pomýlil adresu a nakoniec skončí vo vlaku, ktorý ho nenávratne odváža mimo mesto. Ani netuší, že mal byť aj ženíchovým svedkom. Kto sa zhostí tejto úlohy takto narýchlo? Stihne sa v časovom limite vykonať obrad, keď už trpezlivosť dochádza ja samotnému oddávajúcemu? Ako dopadne vypustenie holubice, symbolu lásky? Kde nakoniec bude svadobná hostina? Bude naozaj Peter Cmorik hrať mladomanželom? A prečo nedorazil ani objednaný koč ťahaný bielymi koňmi?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Svadobné fotografie: Ildikó sa vracia domov ráno v župane. László je zarazený a uvažuje, či má začať žiarliť. Viac ho ale prekvapia veľké svadobné fotografie Milky a Gergeja, ktoré dala Ildikó urobiť trojmo pre všetky rodiny. Jednu hneď odnesie susedom. Andrejka sa postupne so všetkými lúči, sťahuje sa do Viedne. František a László zháňajú celebritu na slávnostný výstrel v Deň Svätého Huberta - zahájenie poľovníckej sezóny. Keď Ildi nesie fotografiu Gergejovi, zastihne ho práve v objatí s Andrejkou. Ildi podozrieva Andrejku, že stále miluje Gergeja a chce ho získať späť. Jej podozrenie potvrdzuje aj to, že Andrejka vraj nechtiac zničí dve z troch svadobných fotografií... Poteší táto dekorácia všetkých tak ako chcela Ildikó? Kto je nový Andrejkin nápadník, ktorý si od nej požičiava peniaze a sľúbil jej byt vo Viedni? A kto sprostredkúva predaj jej starého bytu? Naozaj je Milkin život v ohrození, alebo je v nebezpečenstve niekto iný?

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Michaela má 6 detí s dvomi mužmi, s druhým mužom býva u svokrovcov, keďže si nemôžu dovoliť vlastné bývanie. Jej 14 ročná dcéra Silvia však odluku od otca ťažko zvláda a často uteká aj na 2 dni preč z domu. Gizka sa rozhodne poslať ju na liečenie a učí celú rodinu ako takúto situáciu zvládať.

programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Vlado urobí veľké gesto za to, že mu Ján zachránil život a nezastaví výrobu vo fabrike. Roman ho však podozrieva, že to je len ďalšia hra a nik netuší, aké má Vlado v skutočnosti plány. Michal Paule navrhne, aby sa s Paľkom vrátili domov a problém so súdom riešili spolu ako rodina.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. Tentokrát to na statku bude o „súboji generácií“, kedy o atraktívnu finančnú výhru zabojuje 15 farmárov, rozdelených do troch skupín podľa generácie. Každá sa narodila v inom období a práve Farma ukáže, ktorá generácia na statku uspeje – bude to skupina X, narodená pred rokom 1989, skupina Y – deti 90-tych rokov alebo najmladšia generácia Z, narodená po roku 2000? Fanúšikovia obľúbenej šou sa znovu môžu tešiť na staronové prostredie Považského Inovca, v ktorom sa natáčala 13. séria Farmy, nekompromisnú Alicu, nový typ farmárčenia spojený s množstvo noviniek a výrazne zmenené pravidlá, ktoré prekvapia nejedného farmára. Opäť nebudú chýbať ani napínavé duely či jednotlivé epizódy, v ktorých sa bude striedať smiech, slzy, vtipné i dramatické situácie, a tak ako vždy budú plné nečakaných zvratov. Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Pestúni: Marek a Diana majú niečo po štyridsiatke. Žijú v spokojnom manželstve, no roky sa im nedarilo počať dieťa. Nevyšlo im ani niekoľko pokusov s umelým oplodnením, najmä Diana je z celého snaženia zúfalá. Obaja začnú uvažovať nad adopciou, no problémom je Marekova minulosť. Zostáva im posledná možnosť, ktorá má však svoje riziká...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Roman konfrontuje Vlada, aby vyložil karty na stôl. Paľko navštívi súdnu psychologičku, ktorá má zistiť, či Paľko vyrastá v harmonickom prostredí. Vinco vymyslí rafinovaný plán, ako Cilku presvedčiť, aby sa vrátila do fabriky.

programme.title: Big brother
programme.sub-title: Reality show ČR/SR
programme.desc: Big Brother otvára bránu svojho domu a privíta 16 nových spolubývajúcich, ktorých bude sledovať pomocou 58 kamier, 24 hodín a 7 dní v týždni. O vylúčení jednotlivých súťažiacich budú rozhodovať diváci pomocou mobilnej aplikácie. Víťaz si odnesie rozprávkovú výhru 100-tisíc eur. Spolubývajúci, ktorí v dome vydržia až do finále, strávia spoločne 9 týždňov, neminú ich teda ani vianočné sviatky... Celosvetová legenda a symbol televíznych šou prichádza na Slovensko a do Česka. Niekoľko súťažiacich bude počas dvoch mesiacov, za nepretržitého dohľadu kamier, žiť úplne izolovane v špeciálnom dome bez akéhokoľvek kontaktu s okolitým svetom. Počas celého priebehu šou budú účastníci vystavení rôznym súťažiam a výzvam, ktoré otestujú ich fyzické schopnosti, mentálnu vytrvalosť a sociálne zručnosti. V priebehu šou môžu obyvatelia domu získavať výhody. Big Brother ich bude skúšať, pripravovať nástrahy a tajné misie. Vyhrať chcú všetci, ale stotisícovú výhru si môže odniesť iba jeden.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Šperk: Manželia Karol a Jana s dcérou Monikou sa rozhodli kvôli práci presťahovať do mesta. Monike je bližší život na dedine, no s rozhodnutím rodičov nevie nič urobiť. Malým zadosťučinením je ich nový sused Noro, ktorý je rovnako starý ako Monika a ktorý sa javí ako milý a ochotný...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Hanbliví: Anita bude mať tridsať. Je to krehká bytosť, ktorá si žije vo svojom svete. Celý život prežila v bytovke v susedstve rovnako starého Leonarda. Ten má tiež svoj svet, takže by sa zdalo, že obaja sa k sebe hodia. Do bytovky sa však prisťahuje Samuel, ktorý by mohol byť snom každej ženy...

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack (1)
programme.desc: Meet the Packs. The large Manzi pack in the lush heartland, the Kakuli pack in the badlands and the tiny Stork colony pack living at the park's edge; Julz shares their victories and defeats.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack (2)
programme.desc: A Close Encounter. As the temperatures rise, the water is getting scarce; the Manzi pack must stand alongside predators to hydrate at a remaining precious water spot; Weka's pack feed the pups; the Stork colony thrive against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack (3)
programme.desc: Stork Pack in Trouble. A lost Stork pack puppy; Manzi pups are finding their place in the hierarchy, figuring out neighbor friends and foes; Julz goes on a search mission for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack (4)
programme.desc: Big Cats, Big Trouble. The Manzi dogs dodge a leopard while they treat themselves to a stolen feast; there is no such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as they're foiled by a puku antelope; Julz and Simon find the Stork pack and retreat from charging elephants.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack (5)
programme.desc: The Lost Boy. Julz catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill; the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rain to come; a hunt with a returning male of the Stork colony.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack (6)
programme.desc: Here Comes the Rain. An emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs; he discovers the Stork colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass; the playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Muscle Bean. Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A New Friend. Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Lift. Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dig This. Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. Trying to make Mrs Wicket aware of the danger and save Scrapper and Teddy from being blown to smithereens takes courage nerve and a Bean styled homemade bomb disposal kit.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Flush Hour. The babies learn the purpose of toilets.
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Super Tilly. Tilly is dressed as her alter-ego, SuperTilly – the greatest superhero in the universe! When her dad asks her if she can send him his toolbox, it’s SuperTilly to the rescue!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: White Dwarf, Blue Madhu. When Glitch's compartment empties out and a huge amount of junk floats out, Ella suggests that Slippy get rid of it. They all head to Vesta. Madhu finds something that looks like a robot so the gang sets out to find the other pieces.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: I Quit. After a particularly rough cat-and-mouse chase, Jerry quits! Tom is stunned as he watches his little friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave for another house. It's only days later as Jerry's gaining weight and a lonely Tom unsuccessfully looks to Spike for companionship and a new mouse-mate (named Mickey!) that they realize how much they need each other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: You Can't Handle the Tooth. When Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogre's tooth, they warn Tom and Jerry not to touch it. Naturally, they both try to get the other one to touch it, until they accidentally both touch it and discover it has greater powers than they ever could imagine. Now, neither of them want to let it go!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Pain for Sale. When Rick plans a big yard sale for the next morning, Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to find Tyke's first puppy collar in the gear before it's sold. Accidentally locked in the garage all night, Tom and Jerry end up battling with every yard sale toy, gadget, yard tool and houseware item at their disposal.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Return to Sender. When Hildie receives another dozen black roses from a secret admirer, her curiosity is piqued. Sending Tom and Jerry to find out the identity of the mystery admirer, they end up at the Enchanted Flower Shop across the forest, where they encounter some frightful arrangements and a few "dead ends."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Home Insecurity. After Rick and Ginger install a high-tech, state-of-the-art home security system, Tom and Jerry's shenanigans activate the home's automation system. Using the system against each other, they quickly lose control and the house shuts them down.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Tom-Fu. During one of their regular cat-and-mouse scraps, Tom is accidentally knocked out. When he awakens, he discovers that he's become a kung-fu master. It's now up to Jerry, Tuffy and Spike to reverse the process before they spend their lives getting Tom-Fu'd. If only someone could get near him...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Jerry Rigged. After yet another unsuccessful attempt to catch Jerry, Tom falls under the influence of a traveling cat salesman named Carver, who sells him a series of elaborate mousetraps, tricks and schemes. Setting out to dish up a "world of hurt" on Jerry, Tom only managed to injure himself.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Ball Pool. Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Pizza Bean. Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Photograph. Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dancing Bean. Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes II
programme.sub-title: Take Us Out to the Ballgame

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Analog Ella. Ella and the gang are going camping! But as they approach their camp site, Maggie alerts them that a giant solar flare is heading their way. They must turn off all their electronics until the storm subsides.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: In the year 3021, on a space station somewhere between Mars and Jupiter in the Milky Way, 8-year-old Ella Ryder sets out with her friends on exciting adventures of discovery.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Who's The Boss. Tom walks in and catches Mercury trying to break into in the garage. He thinks Mercury would make the cool, exciting pet he's always wanted. To Mike's horror, Tom makes him promise to make sure nothing happens to Mercury while he's at school. Mike, ever the obedient pooch, does his best but the turtles want Mercury out of the house. Mercury is making himself way too comfortable. Mike will need to use all his brainpower to kick the unwanted guest out of the house and enlists Freddy as an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Trojan Racoons. The raccoons find a brilliant way of getting into the Mikkelsen's house without anyone noticing by getting mailed to the house inside in a cardboard box. Mike falls for it and the raccoons are free to steal whatever they want in their few minutes of freedom inside the house. The racoons skedaddle back to their lair, but instead of stealing the loot, Mercury brings back an old grandfather clock that belonged to the family's grandmother. Now Mike has to break into the raccoon's lair, retrieve the family heirloom and give the raccoons a taste of their own medicine.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time

They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Hypnotised. Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wash. Mr Bean's car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. Bean cannot resist and builds a car-washing contraption to help him out. But when a certain very posh visitor’s car gets damaged Bean thinks he’s for the chop.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Where Did You Get That Cat? Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket’s flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that it’s only his landlady’s furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friend’s life.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Valuable Lessons. Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesn’t trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Some Assembly Required
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Analog Ella. Ella and the gang are going camping! But as they approach their camp site, Maggie alerts them that a giant solar flare is heading their way. They must turn off all their electronics until the storm subsides.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: In the year 3021, on a space station somewhere between Mars and Jupiter in the Milky Way, 8-year-old Ella Ryder sets out with her friends on exciting adventures of discovery.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Downton Tabby. In a post-Edwardian era, Tom lives in the basement of an impressive manor belonging to an aristocratic family. When the Butler asks him to rid the house of a troublesome mouse upstairs, he also promises him a life of comfort upstairs if he succeeds. Unfortunately for Tom, Jerry overheard the entire conversation, making Tom's opportunity all the more challenging.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Pillow Case. Unable to sleep because of the incessant barking from a dog somewhere in the city, Tom and Jerry must track down the noisy mutt. When they find the dog with the help of a friendly bat, they discover the pup can't sleep without her special pillow. Now, for the sake of everyone's sleep, the great pillow case is on!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Tail of Two Kitties. Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butch's tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until he's feeling better. Butch is finally getting what he's wanted, much to Tom's chagrin, especially now that Ginger's having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerry's getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Vanishing Creamed. Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm that'll soften and beautify her gnarly-looking feet. She has Tom rub it in, nice and good. Unfortunately, the foot balm is a little too strong and makes her foot disappear. Hildie's recipe may be a foot balm bomb but it gives Tom a good idea. He'll use it to "vanish" into thin air. Jerry literally doesn't know what hit him when the invisible cat bats him around like a ball of yarn. Tom is unaware when the effects begin to wear off and Jerry is able to defend himself. When Jerry gets a hold of the cream, it's his turn to have the upper hand. A battle of the vanishing cream ensues, each using it in various ways to outwit the other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Unhappily Harried After. It's Tom's wedding day! He's getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that we're experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it can't possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: In The Beginning. We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Ginger's house. Inside, the house is empty – no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors – the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesn't want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Shopping. Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Jurassic Bean. Mr Bean is on a photography jaunt in the countryside snapping the normal everyday wildlife – a fox a bird a dinosaur! A DINOSAUR?!! Mr Bean is terrified until he realises what fame and fortune it could bring him. Does he get the photograph of a lifetime or is the situation not quite as it seems?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Caring Bean. Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Opera Bean. Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Taxi Bean. Mr Bean takes a taxi to his local toyshop but a dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Mr Bean for a ride. After a mix up Mr Bean finds himself driving the taxi and starts to have fun couriering people to their destinations even giving an American tourist an extensive tour of London. But will the taxi driver find out what’s been going on and how much will Bean’s final fare be?

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels

They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Metal Mess. Slippy needs iron to fix his spaceracer. Ella tows him to a metal asteroid where Glitch is instructed to cut off a small piece. But when Ella distracts him, he accidentally cuts the asteroid into two large pieces! Ella feels responsible

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: All in Good Time. Ella is excited to get her own room but Tilly is not as thrilled. She asks Slippy if he can make her a time machine to slow down time so tomorrow never comes. Slippy says the only place time shows down is around black holes.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Toodle Boom! Tom's planned afternoon rendezvous with Toodles goes off the tracks when the mouse-obsessed Toodles catches a glimpse of Tuffy and Jerry. Despite Tom's best efforts to keep her focus on him, her accident-prone ways force him to choose between romance and self-preservation.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Meanie Genie. After the witches fly off into the night, Tom chases Jerry into a room full of enchanted bottles. When Jerry tries to hide in one, he inadvertently releases a mischievous thousand-year old genie who grants him three wishes.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: To Kill a Mockingbird. A mockingbird has taken roost in a tree outside Ginger's window, where it sings the sweetest songs whenever she's around. When she leaves for work, however, the mockingbird earns its name by mocking Tom and Jerry relentlessly. When her nest full of eggs hatches and the insults really take flight, Tom, Jerry and even Spike, decide it's time for these birds to fly the coop!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Bringing Down the House. While Rick and Ginger are away, an overly ambitious young housesitter ruins Tom's plans to rule the roost. Of course, Jerry delights in Tom's predicament…until the sitter spots the mouse, and he becomes enemy numero uno!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Hiccup and Away. When Tom gets the hiccups, the witches decide that the only way to cure him is to scare him, so they banish him to the Wicked Forest of Very Scary Things. Unfortunately, there really isn't anything that frightening in, so they enlist Jerry to conjure up some scares – a task that he's only too happy to oblige, by taking full advantage of the situation.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Ice Cream. Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Birthday Party. Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isn’t invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party – even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: In The Garden. Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A Magic Day Out. Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes II
programme.sub-title: These Little Piggies Went to Market
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes II
programme.sub-title: Now Museum Now You Don't
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Super Tilly. Tilly is dressed as her alter-ego, SuperTilly – the greatest superhero in the universe! When her dad asks her if she can send him his toolbox, it’s SuperTilly to the rescue!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: White Dwarf, Blue Madhu. When Glitch's compartment empties out and a huge amount of junk floats out, Ella suggests that Slippy get rid of it. They all head to Vesta. Madhu finds something that looks like a robot so the gang sets out to find the other pieces.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V
programme.desc: A Kick in the Butler. A Tom and Jerry chase through Postlewaite Manor results in major injuries to Cates which places his defense of the Butler's Linen Gloves Boxing Title in jeopardy. But never fear, Tom will step into the ring and defend Cate's title.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show V

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dancing Bean. Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Shopping. Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.sub-title: Humpty Dumpty. How can you drop an egg and not have it break? Sing along and find out!
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wars. Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Wedding Day. Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Phone. Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Hotel Bean. A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Failed Star. Ella finds her Nanny's old Hide and Peek device and hopes to beat Slippy's record for Hide and Seek! Gem and I.Lo are playing too. Slippy decides to make things more interesting by siphoning fuel from the Hide and Peek.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Starquake! The Ryder family completes a drill in the event of a Starquake. Shields are deployed around Home and Dad's museum on the moon. The drill is a success but the shield on the moon is stuck open.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!
